channel.title: Shop non stacks
channel.description:
is there a way to make it so that for 1 shop, items are not stackable inside the shop? so if the shop has 10 red phats in it, it would show actually 10 separate red phats, instead of 1 red phat with the number "10" over it?
Using : 317 PI

item.title: Shop non stacks
